import React from "react"; import cl from "./Basket.module.css" import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { PaymentForm } from "../UI/PaymentForm/PaymentForm"; import {MyButton} from "../UI/UIs/MyButton/MyButton" export const Basket=()=> { const basket=useSelector(state=>state.basket) return(
{basket.items.length==0?

У вас пока нет товаров в корзине
